[console_scripts]

pydecs-dpath-searchPaths = pydecs.aux_dpath:search_paths
pydecs-main = pydecs.pydecs:pydecs_main
pydecs-plot-densities = pydecs.aux_plot_defectdata:plot_defect_data
pydecs-post-autoDefIdentification = pydecs.aux_runSupport:apply_defIdentification_to_all
pydecs-post-autoFNV = pydecs.aux_runSupport:apply_extFNV_to_all
pydecs-post-calcFNV-VASP = pydecs.aux_EdefCorrection_VASP:calcEdefCorrectionVASP
pydecs-post-collectEnergies = pydecs.aux_runSupport:collect_energies_vasp
pydecs-post-defIdentification = pydecs.aux_post:identify_defects
pydecs-prep-chkDupl-POSCARs = pydecs.aux_prep:check_duplication
pydecs-prep-cif2pocar = pydecs.aux_prep:cif_to_poscar
pydecs-prep-convDOS-VASP = pydecs.aux_convDOS:convDOSfromVASP
pydecs-prep-convGasEne-JANAF = pydecs.aux_convGasEne:convGasEneFromJANAF
pydecs-prep-findInt-CHGCAR = pydecs.aux_prep:find_interstitial_from_CHGCAR
pydecs-prep-genDefectModels = pydecs.aux_prep:generate_defect_models
pydecs-prep-getGasEne-JANAF = pydecs.aux_convGasEne:getGasEneFromJANAF
pydecs-prep-grouping-POSCAR = pydecs.aux_prep:group_by_symmetry
pydecs-prep-poscar2cif = pydecs.aux_prep:poscar_to_cif
